extendedInfo.description: â ver 1.0.2 update â 1) new casual mode was added. - Casual mode is added to eight planets, each planet will be added to the landmark, landmark for part of a user's ID is displayed. 2) a variety of items have been upgraded. - Super Robot: Basic robot for 7 days (168 hours) during the year gives two times faster upgrades. - O2 generator: +5 O2 consumable itself as a building has a grid in the area of ??around 3 +5 O2 generates. - Mineral Generator: expendable after the construction of a building, every 20 seconds to produce 50 of the minerals. - Safety Free: the permanent safety of the planet will remain 100%. Rescue the human race by creating new colonies on distant planets in this epic sim sci-fi adventure! The year is 2150, and the Earthâs resources have been exhausted, rendering our former home uninhabitable. Itâs your job to rebuild civilization, using your wits and all of the technology and resources available to you. Explore the universe, choose new planets for Earthâs people, and keep your colonists safe and healthy. The future of mankind depends upon you. But youâll have help, from your trusty and beautiful android sidekick, Runa. Together, you must cope with each unexpected crisis while managing each colony wisely. Features>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> *More than twenty unique building types * Thirty planets, each with their own mysteries * Forty goal-oriented stages to put your skills to the test * A huge variety of futuristic technology at your disposal * Numerous quests and original challenges

reviews.title: Cheat application
reviews.comment: I would have gave this game a 5 star but sometimes when i try to launch the game i get a game error popup and it says i have a cheat application.  The game then freezes and i have to relauch it.  After that it works usually fine.  There are SEVERAL english typos in the game.  Have the dev even played it in english?  Good game beside accussing me of.harboring hacking apps
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: fubared
reviews.comment: I just installed this went to play said I have a cheat application this is foul
reviews.author: Montrance Roberson

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Game doesn\'t even load...stays on the loading screen and thats it....Uninstalled

reviews.title: High hopes
reviews.comment: Looks like it could be a good game....but it doeent seem to work on the (HTC EVO LTE).....long load times and a lot of freezes in,in-game animations....other then that I would give this game 5 stars
